backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as the backend entry point with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the replacement of the old coin image with pointless-coin-p.dim_512x512.png across Navigation, HeroSection, AboutSection, and CommunitySection components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON map of frontend source files to short descriptions summarizing each component's purpose, styling, and notable recent changes like coin image updates and removed elements.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base CSS file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens including background, foreground, card, border, and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the React app with a root div and a module script loading main.tsx, titled 'The Pointless Coin'.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that composes the full page layout by rendering Navigation, HeroSection, TickerBanner, AboutSection, TokenomicsSection, HowToBuySection, CommunitySection, and Footer in order.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: Two-column section displaying the updated pointless-coin-p image with gold glow effects alongside humorous meme-coin copy, tag pills, and an origin story subsection.
frontend/src/components/CommunitySection: Community section featuring a single X Communities social card and a large CTA banner with the floating pointless-coin-p image and Buy/Join Community buttons.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site footer with brand logo, quick-link scroll buttons, an X Communities social icon, a legal disclaimer, dynamic copyright year, and a caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Renders the landing page hero section with a floating coin image, animated star particles, headline, ticker symbol, tagline, and CTA buttons that smooth-scroll to relevant sections.
Displays a three-step guide (create Phantom wallet, swap SOL for $POINTLESS, hold) with icons, descriptions, and tips in a card grid layout.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Fixed top navigation bar with scroll-aware background, smooth-scroll nav links, a buy CTA button, and a collapsible mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/RoadmapSection.t: Empty file with no content or exports.
frontend/src/components/TickerBanner.tsx: Renders a horizontally scrolling marquee banner displaying repeated $POINTLESS-themed slogans with a gold styling.
frontend/src/components/TokenomicsSectio: Displays tokenomics stats (1B supply, 0% team allocation) in cards and shows the contract address with a clipboard copy button.
frontend/src/components/TweetBanner.tsx: Empty file with no content or exports.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook, managing AuthClient creation, login/logout flow, delegation validity, and exposing identity and status to consumers.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Google Fonts, sets up Tailwind directives, defines CSS custom properties for a dark gold-themed design system, and provides utility classes for gold glows, buttons, cards, and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that wraps the App component with QueryClientProvider (React Query) and InternetIdentityProvider before mounting to the DOM.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with oklch-based color tokens (gold, dark), custom fonts (Bangers, Black Han Sans, Inter), gold box-shadow utilities, and keyframe animations for accordion, coin float, and pulse-glow effects.
project_state.json: Project state manifest (version 29) describing a Solana-based meme coin website called 'The Pointless Coin', listing architectural notes, existing features, known issues, and image requirements.
